name: Whautomate
description:
Whautomate offers an omnichannel customer engagement and automation platform for Small and medium businesses to boost sales and engagement using our platform. Whautomate offers a comprehensive solution for SMBs with the following benefits:

Omnichannel Communication: Whautomate enables businesses to interact with their customers across multiple channels from a single platform.
Automation: The platform leverages advanced automation capabilities to streamline repetitive tasks, freeing valuable time.
Chatbots: Whautomate allows businesses to create AI-driven conversational experiences tailored to their needs.
Invoicing and Payments: The platform facilitates seamless invoicing and payment processing, streamlining financial transactions.
Segmentation and Broadcasting: Whautomate enables businesses to segment their customer base and run targeted marketing campaigns.
focus_areas: Healthcare, Beauty, Spa, Salons, Education, Marketing, Sales and Customer Service
